title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the 'Open' and 'Close' project options are not consistently available.
EB: Either both 'Open' and 'Close' project options should be available or neither one should be enabled.
SR:
1. Open the Navigator module.
2. Select both P1 and P2.
3. Observe the availability of the 'Open' and 'Close' project options. They should behave consistently, either both available or neither enabled.
